title: Update navbar link text from 'top 10' to 'Standings'

requirements.text: Change the navigation link text from 'top 10' to 'Standings' in the Navigation component

quotes: yes, the current nav bar has a "top 10" link that needs to say "Standings" instead

acceptanceCriteria: The link still navigates to the same page (Top10.tsx)
The text change is visible in both desktop and mobile navigation views

nonGoals: Changing the route path or URL structure
Modifying the Top10 page content or functionality
